object.name: sendChecklist
object.description: Use this method to send a checklist on behalf of a connected business account. On success, the sent Message is returned.
object.html_description: Use this method to send a checklist on behalf of a connected business account. On success, the sent Message is returned.
object.rst_description: Use this method to send a checklist on behalf of a connected business account. On success, the sent :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which the message will be sent
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which the message will be sent
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which the message will be sent
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier for the target chat
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for the target chat
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for the checklist to send
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for the checklist to send
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for the checklist to send
annotations.name: checklist

annotations.description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.html_description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.rst_description: Sends the message silently. Users will receive a notification with no sound.
annotations.name: disable_notification

annotations.description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.html_description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.rst_description: Protects the contents of the sent message from forwarding and saving
annotations.name: protect_content

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the message effect to be added to the message
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the message effect to be added to the message
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the message effect to be added to the message
annotations.name: message_effect_id

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for description of the message to reply to
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for description of the message to reply to
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for description of the message to reply to
annotations.name: reply_parameters

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard
annotations.name: reply_markup
